title: [GAMEPLAY] Bard T-pose when using the 'Laugh' emote

embed.description: This occurred when I was using the 'laugh' emote. It happens when just pressing once and when spamming the emote. I'm not sure if it's skin related (Elderwood Bard) or if it's just a bug that happens once in a while.

body:
This occurred when I was using the 'laugh' emote. It happens when just pressing once and when spamming the emote.
I'm not sure if it's skin related (Elderwood Bard) or if it's just a bug that happens once in a while.

Here's the [video](https://youtu.be/uQM9Occwjio) of it.

replies.body: Hey! We have a fix for this headed out in 8.7. Thanks for the report. <3

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=fqUTsfo4,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-03-28T15:59:03.484+0000)
>
> Hey! We have a fix for this headed out in 8.7. Thanks for the report. <3

Glad to help!
